Buttons

Buttons should only be used within CTA patterns. They should not be placed within content. Links within content should remain regular text links

Lead Generating
Get a Free Consultation

For use for a cta. To chat, sign-up or complete a form. Anything directly lead generating.

Learning
Learn More

For use for an internally redirecting link. Learn More, Read More, Compare Prices ect. Something that doesnâ€™t directly begin conversation or lead generation.

Log in
Log In

For use for any buttons that direct the user to login to their account, or to leave the website.
